command: $update = @{ name="Alex D."; bio="Brand identity, typography, and OSS contributor." } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Patch -Uri "https://reqres.in/api/users/12" -ContentType "application/json" -Body $update | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
explanation: Updates persona details to refine credibility by adjusting bio content on the simulated profile.
rationale_steps: Prepare a minimal patch with updated bio text.
PATCH the mock user resource to emulate incremental profile curation with JSON output.
